text: @allahliker it isn't even the funniest movie that stanley kubrick made (barry lyndon)
@ncavn The camerawork is all Ridley - he was his own cinematographer and operator - same as his commercials. Visually this movie is such a love letter to Barry Lyndon.
@TheTumboy I just found out Barry Lyndon wasn't even a real guy. Fuckin devastated.

@sam_the_jam78 great list😁- I recommend: 

BARRY LYNDON, BRAVEHEART, GODFATHER 1&2, THE ELEPHANT MAN, ONLY GOD FORGIVES, SAVING PRIVATE RYAN, THE DEPARTED, GLADIATOR, INTERATELLAR, INCEPTION, INGLOURIOUS BASTERDS, THERE WILL BE BLOOD, NO COUNTRY FOR OLD MEN, THE REVENANT, APOCALYPTO

@CarriereHenry @Tico_Romao @BoldenSkip @AngusKohm @XanaduFitness @PaoloCelentano1 @hollywoodcruz27 @Zurabi17682134 @collegefilm @akiwiwa @ViperMinion Barry Lyndon is one of my favourite films but nothing comes close to the rawness of OFOTCN. Yes yes yes to Al Pacino
